jsonImport.confirmImport: Importing will take some time depending on the size of the data. Are you sure you want to import JSON now?
jsonImport.importCompleted: Imported new account book, total {{bookSize}} account books, {{accountSize}} accounts, {{transactionSize}} transactions
jsonImport.provideJsonHint: Please provide the JSON file exported by Daily Money One. The file name is usually dmo-<date-time>.json
jsonImport.containInformation: There are a total of {{bookSize}} books, {{accountSize}} accounts, {{transactionSize}} transactions
jsonImport.transactionToCreate: The transaction to be created totals {{size}} entries
jsonImport.transactionAccountMapInvalid: {{size}} transaction account mappings are incorrect. You can still import, but incorrectly mapped transactions will be ignored

message.exportedJson: Book {{names}} has been exported as JSON to /{{location}}, size {{size}} bytes.
message.exportedUploadedJson: Book {{names}} has been exported as JSON to /{{location}}, size {{size}} bytes, and uploaded to Google Drive, upload result {{uploadResult}}.
message.exportJsonToDirectory: Select book and export as JSON to external storage directory, with support for automatic upload. JSON is a plain text data format with better compatibility, making it easier to retain or share your book, but export and import take longer.
message.startJsonImportProcess: Start the JSON import process for Daily Money One

transactionTemplate.name: Name
transactionTemplate.nameHint: The name of the transaction template, length 1 - 128 characters
transactionTemplate.noteHint: The note of the transaction template, length 0 - 512 characters
